Name: 龙骑战歌
About the game: This is a classic Hexagon War Chess game for senior player.This game is not a fast-food game, IQ matters.You need to focus on battlefield strategy.Every map is an IQ battle, and every player can be the creator or the challenger. This game have a map editor, you can be the creator, who creat map and accept other players challenge.But the map been created must be passed by the creator before open to public. You also can be the challenger.Every challenger must pay some game currency for joining. The failures will put their game currency in the bonus pool,and who reach the seccess condition can take all the game currency in bonus pool. IQ matters,we do not encourage players to spend much money.In the game, we only sale week card and month card.The different between who with these cards and not, is only the former can take more game currency everyday. Auction company in the game is a trade platform for players.You can sell the heroes who will not be used anymore-heroes is essential for a battle.Different heroes have different skills and attributes. Different heroes-cooperate can make very different power.Known well heroes' skills and attributes is the basic of playing game well. So far, there are already more than 30 heroes in the game,and more is coming soon.
